location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to David Seton, Resident at Muscat

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, encloses a letter (not included) for the President at Bombay, Jonathan Duncan, and requests that the letter is forwarded to the Presidency. In addition, Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun requests that the Muscat Resident expedite the departure of the HC Schooner Alert(which delivered this letter) from Muscat, as her services are required at Bushire and Bussora [Basra].
